trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of drawings that can be operated upon as a single drawing.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de drawings que podem ser utilizadas após como um único desenho.

trans-unit.source: Use a DrawingGroup to combine multiple drawings into a single, composite drawing.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um DrawingGroup combinar várias drawings para desenhar uma única e composto.

trans-unit.source: Unlike other <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, you can apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> setting, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, or a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> to a DrawingGroup.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de outras <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>objetos, pode aplicar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>definição, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, ou um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>para um DrawingGroup.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: The flexibility of this class enables you to create complex scenes.
trans-unit.target: A flexibilidade desta classe permite-lhe criar complexos em segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: Because DrawingGroup is also a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, it can contain other DrawingGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: Porque DrawingGroup também é um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, pode conter outros objetos DrawingGroup.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, see [Drawing Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>objetos, consulte [descrição geral de objetos de desenho](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the DrawingGroup class provides several special features: DrawingGroup objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Funcionalidades freezable:** porque qual herda o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>classe, a classe de DrawingGroup fornece várias funcionalidades especiais: DrawingGroup objetos podem ser declarados como, partilhada entre vários objetos, tornados só de leitura para melhorar o desempenho, clonar e efetuados seguro para thread.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as diferentes funcionalidades fornecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos, consulte [descrição geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Opens the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> in order to populate its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*>. This method enables you to append additional <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Abre o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> para preencher o <> </> *>. Este método permite-lhe a acrescentar adicionais <> </> *> este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You must close the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> before you can render this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de fechar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>antes de pode compor este <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> that you can use to describe the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> que pode utilizar para descrever o conteúdo deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> para aplicar a este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about bitmap effects and how they work, see [Bitmap Effects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os efeitos de mapa de bits e como funcionam, consulte [descrição geral do mapa de bits efeitos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a região onde o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> aplica-se a <> </> *> e, opcionalmente, um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> para utilizar como entrada para o <> </> *>.

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The region where the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> is applied and, optionally, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to use as input; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*> applies to the whole <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> and uses the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> as its input.
trans-unit.target: A região onde o <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> é aplicada e, opcionalmente, o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> para utilizar como entrada; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <> </> *> aplica-se a totalidade <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> e utiliza o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The default is<xref uid="langword_csharp_ null" name=" null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é<xref uid="langword_csharp_ null" name=" null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> objects that are contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref> objetos que estão contidos neste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The z-order of the child items in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is determined by the order of the child items in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: A ordem z dos itens subordinados de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>determinado by the order of itens subordinados <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: Each child drawing is under the next child in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Cada elemento subordinado de desenho está sob o subordinado seguinte na coleção.

trans-unit.target: Uma coleção do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref> objetos deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é vazio <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the clip region of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a região clip deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Drawings outside the geometry are clipped from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Drawings fora da geometria são anexadas a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>quando é composto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: The geometry does not have to be rectangular; for example, you can use an <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> to clip to an elliptical shape.
trans-unit.target: A geometria tem de ser retangular; Por exemplo, pode utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>para clip a uma forma elíptica.</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>operações são aplicadas pela ordem seguinte: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>2.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>3.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>4.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>

trans-unit.source: ClipGeometry 5.
trans-unit.target: ClipGeometry 5.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>6.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that is used to clip this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> que é utilizado para recortar isto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> and makes deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> e torna profundas cópias dos seus valores.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para produzir modificável cópias só de leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings even though they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método copia propriedades de dependência, copia enlaces de dados e as referências de recurso, apesar de estes já não poderão resolver.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Não copia animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> propriedade do objeto clonado devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo que o <> </> *> é propriedade da origem<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> object and makes deep copies of its current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> de objeto e torna profundas cópias dos seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para produzir modificável cópias só de leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Este método não copia as referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações, embora se copiar os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> é propriedade do objeto clonado <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo que o <> </> *> é propriedade da origem de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"> </xref> para aplicar a este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is applied after the GuidelineSet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>deste <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>é aplicada após a GuidelineSet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the GuidelineSet is transformed along with the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o GuidelineSet é transformada juntamente com o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"> </xref> para aplicar a este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a opacidade disto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of `1` specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is completely opaque; a value of `0` specifies that it is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de `1` Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>é completamente opaco; um valor de `0` Especifica que é completamente transparente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: A value that is less than 0 is treated as 0, and a value that is larger than 1 is treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que seja inferior a 0 é tratado como 0 e um valor maior que 1 é tratado como 1.

trans-unit.source: Another way to control the opacity of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> is to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: Outra forma de controlar a opacidade de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>é especificar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A>do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>operações são aplicadas pela ordem seguinte: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>2.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>

trans-unit.source: Opacity 3.
trans-unit.target: Opacidade 3.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>4.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> 5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>5.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> 6.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>6.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that describes the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0 e 1, inclusive, que descreve a opacidade disto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is `1`.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é `1`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush used to alter the opacity of select regions of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o Pincel utilizada para alterar a opacidade da regiões selecionadas isto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is mapped to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>Está mapeado para <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: The opacity value of each pixel of the mapped <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is used to determine the resulting opacity of each corresponding pixel of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da opacidade de cada pixel de mapeada <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>é utilizado para determinar a opacidade resultante da cada pixel correspondente do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Only the opacity value of each color in the brush is used for this processing; all other color information is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Apenas o valor da opacidade de cada cor no pincel é utilizado para este processamento; todas as outras informações de cor são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The opacity that this property specifies is multiplied with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: A opacidade que esta propriedade especifica se multiplica o com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>valor o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as máscaras de opacidade e como funcionam, consulte [descrição geral de máscaras de opacidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>operações são aplicadas pela ordem seguinte: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: OpacityMask 2.
trans-unit.target: OpacityMask 2.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>3.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>4.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>
